name: Save pending JIRA Server issues to a Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet and send it as a Microsoft 365 Email
description:
This template allows you to search for JIRA Server pending tasks, save them to a Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet and send the worksheet as a Microsoft 365 Email.

Your Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet has to contain headers. The template uses this [worksheet](https://1drv.ms/x/s!AjJKBs6vWrtygR1B4EAsBeLSl5x_?e=WlcVt0).
